item.title: Building Studio Lepine: How I Shipped a Portfolio Site in 2 Hours with AI
item.description: I built my entire portfolio site in 2 hours using React, TypeScript, and AI assistance. This is the story of escaping a corporate domain monopoly, finally committing to a brand that matters, and shipping professional web presence without being a "real" developer.
item.author: cody@lepine.biz (Cody Lepine)
